title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\InstanceTemplate
name: InstanceTemplate
description:
Represents an Instance Template resource.

You can use instance templates to create VM instances and managed instance groups. For more information, read Instance Templates. (== resource_for {$api_version}.instanceTemplates ==)

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.InstanceTemplate

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.creation_timestamp
params.description: [Output Only] The creation timestamp for this instance template in RFC3339 text format.

params.name: data.description
params.description: An optional description of this resource. Provide this property when you create the resource.

params.name: data.id
params.description: [Output Only] A unique identifier for this instance template. The server defines this identifier.

params.name: data.kind
params.description: [Output Only] The resource type, which is always compute#instanceTemplate for instance templates.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of the resource; provided by the client when the resource is created. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035. Specifically, the name must be 1-63 characters long and match the regular expression [a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])? which means the first character must be a lowercase letter, and all following characters must be a dash, lowercase letter, or digit, except the last character, which cannot be a dash.

params.name: data.properties
params.description: The instance properties for this instance template.

params.name: data.self_link
params.description: [Output Only] The URL for this instance template. The server defines this URL.

params.name: data.source_instance
params.description: The source instance used to create the template. You can provide this as a partial or full URL to the resource. For example, the following are valid values: - https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/project/zones/zone/instances/instance - projects/project/zones/zone/instances/instance

params.name: data.source_instance_params
params.description: The source instance params to use to create this instance template.
